item.description:
The second hike to the park. 860 acre forested park with Chapman Falls with overall drop of 60 feet over a series of steps. This hike is about 3.4 miles and staying mostly on the orange and "no blaze" trails (Vista and youth group camping area trails). The hike will include the falls, a bridge, senic overlook of the glacially modified valley, and the Devil's Oven.

We'll meet at the parking area near the picnic pavilion at 3 PM. The hike is anticipated to take about 1.75 hours and should be done by about 4:45 PM. A trail map can be found at the park link provided. If there is interest, we'll find a place to eat afterwards.

Directions can be found at the location link on this event. Kevin S will lead and is the contact for this one. I hope many of you can join in on the hike!

For more information, see http://dep.state.ct.u...

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group
